lead_paragraph: Some of our readers may remember that a novel theory of the structure of the Earth was propounded some years ago by one Capt. SYMMES, and that it was explained and advocated in this City and elsewhere by JOHN N. REYNOLDS, Esq., who afterwards became a prominent politician and lawyer here.
